text: الم تر كيف فعل ربك بعاد

translations.translation: Do you not see what your Lord did with 'Ad -
Have you not seen what your Lord did to the 'Ad
Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with Ad
(Muhammad), consider how your Lord dealt with the tribe of Ad,
Did you not see how did your Lord deal with (the tribe of) Aad?
Saw you not how your Lord dealt with `Ad
Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with Ad,
Hast thou not seen how thy Lord did with Ad,
Dost thou not consider how thy Lord dealt with (the tribe of) A'ad,
Have you not heard of how your Lord dealt with the tribe of 'Ad,
Bethinkest thou not in what wise thy Lord did with the 'A'ad:
Have you not regarded how your Lord dealt with [the people of] ‘Ad,
Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the 'Ad (people),-
Did you (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) not see (thought) how your Lord dealt with 'Ad (people)?
Have you not heard how your Lord dealt with Aad?
Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with Aad?
Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
[89:6] Have you not seen, [do you not] know O Muhammad (s), how your Lord dealt with ‘Ād,

Dost thou not consider) have you not been informed, Muhammad, in the Qur'an (how thy Lord dealt with (the tribe of) 'Aad) the people of Hud, how Allah, Exalted is He, destroyed them when they disbelieved,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ إِرَمَ [ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ] أي ألم تَعلمْ
 وهما عَادان، عادُ الأُولى: وهي إِرمُ ذَاتِ العِمادِ معناه ذَات الطُّولِ
 وعادٌ الأَخيرة: وهم أهلُ عَمودٍ
 ويقال الذين قاتَلهم مُوسى عليه السّلامُ

translations.translation:
Did you not see how your Lord dealt with the people of 'Ad? With the strong and mighty city of Iram?


And they were both {Ulamā'}, the first {Ulamā'}: and she was {Irmū} of {al-'Imād} {ma'nā} {aḏ-ḏātil}.


The last of the Waad are those who are of the column.


Those who fought against Moses (peace be upon him)

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text:
وجواب القسم ليعذبن المحجوبون لدلالة قوله: { ألم تر كيف فعل ربّك بعاد } إلى قوله: { لبالمرصاد } عليه أو في معنى التقرير أي: إنما يهتدي إلى ذلك أولو الألباب الصافية المجرّدة عن شوب الوهم
 وجواب القسم: ليثابنّ العقلاء المعتبرون بحال المحجوبين دونهم

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: استبعدت يا أكمل الرسل تعذيبنا إياهم وانتقامنا عنهم { أَلَمْ تَرَ } أي: ألم تعلم ولم تخبر بالتواتر الموجب للجزم واليقين { كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ } [الفجر: 6] يعني: كذي أهل عاداً
